quote_first: There had been eighteen deaths since ten o’clock the previous night. The worst incident – 1H 2D 4K – was three adults and four children killed in a car smash in Pankow just after 11. No action taken; that could be left to the Orpo. A family burned to death in a house-fire in Kreuzberg, a stabbing outside a bar in Wedding, a woman beaten to death in Spandau. The record of March’s own disrupted morning was last on the list:
quote_last: [O] (that meant notification had come from the Orpo) 1H Havel/March. The secretary stepped back and recapped her pen with a sharp click.
title: Fatherland
author: Robert Harris
